column1: https://tinyurl.com/y9x79dypThis hasn't happened yet but has been talked about since the 'quarantine' idea was first talked about. Time will tell.

Thanks for sharing - personally I'll be incredibly surprised if this doesn't happenThe additional uncertainty will come though through the fact that either side could have a second spike at any time and the short -term agreement then falls down - i.e - even if it gets agreed it doesn't mean that it will be guaranteed to still be in place for August, September or October.Edited: 3:17 am, June 09, 2020
